data.eml:eml: A new terrestrial frog (Anura: Craugastoridae) from the montane cloud forests of the southeastern Ecuadorian Andes

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sánchez-Nivicela, Juan C. (2017): A new terrestrial frog (Anura: Craugastoridae) from the montane cloud forests of the southeastern Ecuadorian Andes. Zootaxa 4318 (3): 520-530, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4318.3.5
